my_business:
PeeJay Max XPRESS PLAST is a ready mix plaster , manufactured in a highly advanced Automatic Programmable Logic Controller (PLC) Plant by Schwing Stetter. Through meticulous quality control, Xpress Plast offers a pre-mixed, high-performance blend of cement binders, premium aggregates, polymers, and fibers. Designed for versatile use in interior, exterior, and ceiling applications.
One of the unique features of Xpress Plast is its excellent consistency, coverage, and weather-resistant properties, making it a practical choice for various environments. Its unique formulation ensures easy workability and smooth application, suitable even for machine application, which saves time and reduces labor. The plaster offers remarkable adhesion to most substrates, minimizing shrinkage cracks and enhancing cement hydration for a polished finish. With reduced material wastage and minimal storage requirements, Xpress Plast is an economical solution that meets the needs of modern construction sites.

The construction landscape in Kerala was booming,so was  the reign of TOUGHIE to the current leadership.
In 2012, TOUGHIE designed and developed a concrete based interlocking block technology that was more rugged, easy to deploy and revolutionary in the construction field. my_favourite_bni_story: A member of a BNI chapter, Sarah, was a small business owner who ran a boutique marketing agency. She’d been struggling to attract clients who needed the kind of niche marketing services she offered. One day, during a chapter meeting, she received a referral from another member, Tom, who ran a web development business. Tom had a friend, a local restaurant owner, who was looking to boost their online presence. Sarah and the restaurant owner met, and despite a rocky start, they found common ground and worked together on a digital marketing campaign. The campaign was a huge success, driving tons of traffic to the restaurant and increasing sales significantly. But the story doesn’t end there—because of that success, the restaurant owner referred Sarah to several other restaurant owners, and soon Sarah’s agency was serving a whole new niche market. That initial referral turned into a big opportunity, growing Sarah’s business beyond what she could have imagined. The relationship she built through BNI not only helped her gain new clients, but it also gave her the confidence to push her business to the next level. This story emphasizes the power of building strong connections and how one referral can change everything. It's about leveraging a trusted network, which is a huge part of what BNI is all about.
